attributes.action: Save Grameen Bank and Banker to the Poor: Nobel Laureate Dr. Muhammad Yunus
attributes.additional_details: It makes me immensely sad to see the poor women are being deprived of their rightful ownership and their rights as owners to exercise their power over the Grameen bank.This is a very wrong step by Goverment of Bangladesh are taking; they should refrain from proceeding with this. The decision of the government would destroy this well known bank for the poor, the bank that has made the country proud.Please save Save Grameen Bank and Banker to the Poor: Nobel Laureate Dr. Muhammad Yunus
